About Me

When im not coding I spend most my days going to the gym, bass fishing, or playing Call Of Duty. I try to spend a fair amount of time outdoors to embrace what mother nature devleloped for us. Before programming I played football as a middle linebacker. When football came to an end I searched for a new passion I found in coding. I enjoyed working for T-mobile and thought to myself "I can make these apps". Ever since my joy for programming grows more & more each day.
